name: bambenek-feed
label: Bambenek Feed
description:
Bambenek Consulting is an IT consulting firm focused on cybersecurity and cybercrime. This connector facilitates automated operations related to fetching the list of IP addresses/domains of feed families and ingestion of daily threat feeds.

This connector has a dependency on the Threat Intel Management Solution Pack. Install the Solution Pack before enabling ingestion of Threat Feeds from this source.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Server URL of the Bambenek Feed Security server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: License Type
fields.name: license_type

Commercial.title: Username
Commercial.name: username
Commercial.description: Username to access the Bambenek server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

Commercial.title: Password
Commercial.name: password
Commercial.description: Password to access the Bambenek server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.description: Select license type to fetch Bambenek feeds and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Fetch Indicators
operations.description: Fetches the Threat Intel Feeds using the feeds family type that you have specified as the "Feed Family Type" parameter of Bambenek.

parameters.title: High-Confidence Families Only
parameters.name: high_confidence

true.title: Feed Family Type
true.name: feed_family_types
true.tooltip: Note: Supported feed family types for Non-Commercial license: C2 IP, C2 Domain
true.description: Select Bambenek feed family type to fetch specific feed listed IPs/domain. You can choose between DGA Domain, C2 All Indicator, C2 Domain, C2 IP. Note: Supported feed family types for Non-Commercial license: C2 IP, C2 Domain.

false.title: Feed Family Type
false.name: feed_family_types
false.tooltip: Note: Supported feed family types for Non-Commercial license: C2 IP, C2 Domain
false.description: Select Bambenek feed family type to fetch specific feed listed IPs/domain. You can choose between DGA Domain, C2 All Indicator, C2 Domain, C2 IP, Phishing Domain and Malware Domain. Note: Supported feed family types for Non-Commercial license: C2 IP, C2 Domain.

parameters.tooltip: Set High-Confidence Families Only to true if you want to fetch specific Bambenek feed family type as high confidence IPs/domain. When Feed Family Type set to DGA Domain and High-Confidence Families Only set to True then it will fetch "High-Confidence DGA Domain Feed".
parameters.description: Set High-Confidence Families Only to true if you want to fetch specific Bambenek feed family type as high confidence IPs/domain. When Feed Family Type set to DGA Domain and High-Confidence Families Only set to True then it will fetch "High-Confidence DGA Domain Feed".
